effect.shortEffect: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.
effect.full: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

description.sun-moon: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
description.sword-shield: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
